name: chrome-snowplow-inspector
description: Add a panel to DevTools to show Snowplow analytics beacon information.

scripts.start: npm run clean && mkdir -p dist && ln -s ../manifest.json ../res/pd-logo.png ../res/poplin.png ../res/poplin-16.png ../res/poplin-48.png ../res/poplin-128.png ../src/popup.html ../LICENSE.txt dist/ && parcel watch src/panel.html src/options.html src/devtools.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir -p dist && cp manifest.json res/pd-logo.png res/poplin.png res/poplin-16.png res/poplin-48.png res/poplin-128.png src/popup.html LICENSE.txt dist/ && parcel build --no-source-maps src/panel.html src/options.html src/devtools.html
scripts.xpi: npm run build && web-ext build --overwrite-dest -s dist/ -a .
scripts.xpi-signed: npm run build && web-ext sign --id {ab5ef1af-3ce6-4741-9e30-96771603496d} -s dist/ -a .
scripts.zip: npm run build && zip -r poplin-chrome-extension.zip dist/

author: Poplin Data
